duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sales and marketing strategies to drive occupancy and ADR growth, maximizing total revenue.
Lead and oversee the hotel sales department, including sales administration, staff hiring, training, and coaching.
Manage sales and marketing budget, forecast, advertising, and business plans for the hotel, ensuring compliance with approved plans and budgets.
Coordinate all group, transient, and catering sales solicitations to maximize overall revenue.
Proactively conduct outside sales calls, sales tours, and entertain clients to drive business growth.
Monitor production of top accounts, evaluate market trends, and predict revenue opportunities to set proactive strategies.
Train team members to recognize and capitalize on sales opportunities, increasing occupancy and revenue.
Maintain strong visibility in the local community and industry organizations to enhance brand presence and drive business growth.
Travel on a weekly basis as required to conduct sales activities, represent the hotel, and build business relationships.
Act on behalf of the General Manager in their absence, performing any other duties as requested by management.

education_certification.credential: At least 2 years of progressive hotel sales experience preferred; or a 4-year college degree and at least 1 year of related experience; or a 2-year college degree and at least 2 years of related experience
